author: TingLiu6
body: Could you please help to review?

comments.author: lzybkr
comments.body: This test looks essentially useless to me.  I'm inclined to just delete it.

comments.author: lzybkr
comments.body: A bug caught by this test would have been hit by Pester long before getting to this test.  I'm OK with not porting this test.

title: Add Pester Test for MetadataTests2.cs
